sys_ws_operation.name: asset_lookup

sys_update_version.name: sys_ws_operation_48772df783ad2210f257f3a6feaad3ad
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>asset_lookup</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var empId = request.queryParams.emp_id;

    if (!empId) {
        response.setStatus(400);
        return { error: "Missing 'emp_id' in query parameters." };
    }

    var result = [];
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1734342_pletra_0_centralized_asset_table');
    gr.addQuery('emp_id', empId);
    gr.query();

    while (gr.next()) {
        result.push({
            emp_id: gr.getValue('emp_id'),
            product_number: gr.getValue('product_number'),
            asset_type: gr.getValue('asset_type'),
            model: gr.getValue('model'),
            model_number: gr.getValue('model_number'),
            serial_number: gr.getValue('serial_number'),
            manufacturer: gr.getValue('manufacturer')
        });
    }

    if (result.length === 0) {
        response.setStatus(404);
        return { message: "No records found for emp_id: " + empId };
    }

    return result;
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1734342_pletra_0/asset_lookup</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-23 09:34:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>48772df783ad2210f257f3a6feaad3ad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>asset_lookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Pletra Asset Management" source="x_1734342_pletra_0">e2238c7b83c12210f257f3a6feaad35d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Pletra Asset Management">e2238c7b83c12210f257f3a6feaad35d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_48772df783ad2210f257f3a6feaad3ad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-23 09:40:16</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="asset_lookup">4807a1f783ad2210f257f3a6feaad380</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
